Foreground Aperture - Kentaro sleeping and waking at desk
00000 - start, Kentaro motionless
00481 - starts moving
00505 - out of frame
00919 - re-enters
00942 - motionless agaiin
01485 - starts moving
01509 - out of frame
02112 - end

Testing
00260 - 00459 Train (Kentaro still)
00460 - 00489 Run
00489 Evaluate (Few frames after Kentaro starts moving)
